turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order some drinks from the Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which starbucks would you like me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: There should be one on Course Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. and what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like two drinks. Both of them will be the iced caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what sizes would you like for those two?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One of them will be grande. And the other one, I want a Venti ice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want the grande hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I do not.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. both iced it is. and did you want whole milk for both drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you. I would like soy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did u want soy for both?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I did.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. i have you down for 1 grande iced caramel macchiato with soy milk and 1 venti iced caramel macchiato with soy milk from the starbucks on course street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That that sounds perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $10.50 is the total, did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Place the order, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i've placed the order. it'll be ready in 15 mins. did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I do not.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: take care.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You too.
